code: public void run() {     invoked = true.     name2 = Thread.currentThread().getName(). }

@Test public void testSynchronousExecutorService() throws Exception {     name1 = Thread.currentThread().getName().     ExecutorService service = new SynchronousExecutorService().     service.execute(new Runnable() {          public void run() {             invoked = true.             name2 = Thread.currentThread().getName().         }     }).     assertTrue("Should have been invoked", invoked).     assertEquals("Should use same thread", name1, name2). }

@Test public void testSynchronousExecutorServiceShutdown() throws Exception {     ExecutorService service = new SynchronousExecutorService().     service.execute(new Runnable() {          public void run() {             invoked = true.         }     }).     service.shutdown().     assertTrue(service.isShutdown()).     assertTrue(service.isTerminated()). }
